oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ELECTRON CHARGE-DENSITY IN NEON AND OTHER INERT-GAS ATOMS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PATIL, SH
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: scattering
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Elastic differential cross sections for the scattering of high energy electrons by inert gas atoms, at low momentum transfer, are analysed in terms of a model density satisfying some general conditions. This allows us to deduce reliable expressions for the density and expectation values [r(n)].
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF PHYSICS B-ATOMIC MOLECULAR AND OPTICAL PHYSICS, 27(9), 1823-1832
